statements: SELECT * FROM student_enrollment
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM student_enrollment
SELECT course_id, progress FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC
SELECT student_id, progress FROM student_enrollment WHERE progress <= 50
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE progress > 0.8 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM student_enrollment WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT student_id, progress FROM student_enrollment WHERE progress < 0.5 ORDER BY progress DESC, student_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_students, AVG(progress) AS average_progress FROM student_enrollment GROUP BY course_id HAVING total_students > 3 ORDER BY average_progress DESC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 5;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, student_id FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 2
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN course_progress ON students.student_id = course_progress.student_id JOIN courses ON course_progress.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, progress_percent FROM students JOIN course_progress ON students.student_id = course_progress.student_id WHERE progress_percent > 50;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_instructor = 'John Doe';

SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_percent FROM students s INNER JOIN course_progress cp ON s.student_id = cp.student_id INNER JOIN courses c ON cp.course_id = c.course_id WHERE cp.progress_percent >= 50;

SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_percent FROM students s INNER JOIN course_progress cp ON s.student_id = cp.student_id INNER JOIN courses c ON cp.course_id = c.course_id ORDER BY progress_percent DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE id = 3;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress FROM enrollments WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress, last_progress_date FROM progress_tracking ORDER BY last_progress_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT s.name, c.course_name FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.id = e.student_id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.id;
SELECT s.name, c.course_name FROM students s JOIN progress_tracking pt ON s.id = pt.student_id JOIN courses c ON pt.course_id = c.id WHERE pt.progress >= 50;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, start_date, instructor FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_percent FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN progress p ON e.enrollment_id = p.enrollment_id WHERE progress_percent >= 50;
SELECT student_name, quiz_name, score FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN quiz_scores q ON e.enrollment_id = q.enrollment_id WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, course_name, score FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN quiz_scores ON enrollments.enrollment_id = quiz_scores.enrollment_id;
SELECT progress_percent, course_name FROM progress JOIN courses ON progress.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE completed_modules > total_modules * 0.5;
